TopicTitle: What happens if you try to enter Joon

Articles.Content:
So I decided to see what happens if I try to land on joon (yeah I know a gas planet), hoping to see my space craft implode at the center of the planet. Well it went a bit different than that.

Now this is my first KSP video and it was 2AM and raining, so I'm a bit quiet and you get a wonderful ambient sound.

EDIT - Jool* wow I feel like an idiot........

Edited September 29, 2012 by bonebus
lol it is actually realistic, there have been similar resaults from entering jupiter by nasa
